# IDMaps have to be precompiled with scripts/compile_idmaps.rb
#
# Format:
# TYPE[,SUBTYPE] ID NAME
#
# Types:
#   item: Normal item/gun
#   consumable: Consumable (does not go into the inventory by intention)
#   syn: Synergy (format: 'item_name+synergy_name')
#
# Subtypes:
#   unused: item,unused item or consumable
#   internal: Used, but only internally (as an internal hack) item/consumable
#
# Do not edit this file unless you know what you're doing
# (and have prepared a way to migrate save files using these IDs)
